messages.message: In Converse, I donâ€™t understand how to clear my conversation history--even after deleting the file I was using, the conversation history is still present.
I think it would help to have a Clear Conversation button in the conversation bar itself, and/or an option to select a Clear Conversation History checkbox when you delete the file
This is already part of our roadmap. We will ship this soon post launch. @Subash
